original_text: Immediately an angel of the Lord struck him down, because he did not give God the glory, and he was eaten by worms and breathed his last.
korean_text: 헤롯이 영광을 하나님께로 돌리지 아니하므로 주의 사자가 곧 치니 벌레에게 먹혀 죽으니라

sentences.original_text: Immediately an angel of the Lord struck him down
sentences.korean_translation: 주의 천사가 즉시 그를 쳐서 쓰러뜨렸다

sentences.original_text: because he did not give God the glory
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 하나님께 영광을 돌리지 않았기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: and he was eaten by worms
